pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a core package for qb appqb app is a complete application that implements simple architectural concepts. Its goal to separate business logic from infrastructure. Core modules will contain only logic/code that captures business concepts.Infrastructure modules will implement infrastructure specific code.In this version, all core modules will be in a single package. Future versions will split core modules in a more granular scope to help implementers focus on specific modulessee documentation/packaging_concepts.md
